Interface Combatant

public interface Combatant
Represents a combat-capable character in the game. Defines the actions a character can perform or be affected by during combat, including health, strength, weapon handling, and special skills.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      String getName()
      Returns the name of the combatant.
      Returns:
      the combatant's name

    • getHealthPoints

      int getHealthPoints()
      Returns the current health points of the combatant.
      Returns:
      the health points

    • setHealthPoints

      void setHealthPoints(int newHealthPoints)
      Sets the combatant's health points.
      Parameters:
      newHealthPoints - the new health value

    • getIsKnocked

      boolean getIsKnocked()
      Checks whether the combatant is knocked out.
      Returns:
      true if knocked out, false otherwise

    • setIsKnocked

      void setIsKnocked(boolean newIsKnocked)
      Sets the knocked-out status of the combatant.
      Parameters:
      newIsKnocked - true if knocked out, false otherwise

    • getWillPoints

      Sets the combatant's will points.
      Parameters:
      newWillPoints - the new will value

    • getStrength

      Returns:
      the strength value

    • setStrength

      void setStrength(int newStrength)
      Sets the combatant's strength.
      Parameters:
      newStrength - the new strength value

    • getWeapon

      items.Weapon getWeapon()
      Returns the weapon currently equipped by the combatant.
      Returns:
      the equipped weapon

    • setWeapon

      void setWeapon(items.Weapon newWeapon) throws exceptions.InsufficientCharacterLevel
      Equips a new weapon to the combatant.
      Parameters:
      newWeapon - the weapon to equip
      Throws:
      exceptions.InsufficientCharacterLevel - if the combatant's level is too low to equip the weapon

    • getLuck

      boolean getLuck()
      Returns whether the combatant has luck (critical hit chance).
      Returns:
      true if lucky, false otherwise

    • setLuck

      void setLuck(boolean newLuck)
      Sets the luck status of the combatant.
      Parameters:
      newLuck - true if lucky, false otherwise

    • getActions

      HashMap<String, CombatAction> getActions()
      Returns a map of available combat actions by name.
      Returns:
      a map of action names to CombatAction instances

      Returns the damage dealt by a basic attack.
      Returns:
      the attack damage value

    • useSpecialSkill

      Applies damage to the combatant.
      Parameters:
      damage - the amount of damage received

    • chooseAction

      CombatAction chooseAction(Combatant target)
      Chooses a combat action to perform against a target.
      Parameters:
